name: Xani.github.io
body:
### XANi's projects.

There are some of my personal projects, forks and configs:

* [VDROS](http://xani.github.io/vdros/) - Tiny buildroot-based image for debugging, benchmarking and repairing VM environments
* [Blogolicious](https://github.com/XANi/blogolicious) - My playground for Perl and Events. Also (someday will) be useable blogging platform
* [DPP](https://github.com/XANi/dpp) - Distributed puppet - a little helper to download, validate (via git gpg signing) puppet repo and then run masterless puppet agent
* [Config](https://github.com/XANi/config) - Puppet repo with most of my config files


And [there is rest](https://github.com/XANi?tab=repositories) of my small/abandoned/unfinished projects
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
